channel.title: Run server.bat and run client.bat errors
channel.description:
Okay Im having me a runserver.bat error and its aggrivating the piss out of me... im working on a 517 turmoil soulsplit source, but when i go to run it to test my updates I cant run it the cmd says ive editted my run, changed to my edition, wont work still heres my run ----> @echo off Echo 517 color 9 cd ../build "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\java.exe" net/com/codeusa/Server 43594 pause
On my cmd when i run it, u get tons of errors like, main error class or some shit like that. im running windows 7, which is a real pain in the ass.
client probs.. the same thing when i try to run the client. heres my run client.bat ----> @echo off cd src java -Xmx256m client 1 live live software members english game1 pause its pissing me the fuck off please help me?!?!??!?!?!?!!?!?!?!?!?!?!??!?

item.title: Run server.bat and run client.bat errors
item.dc:creator: @1800getk0ed 1800getk0ed
item.description:
@1800getk0ed wrote:

Okay Im having me a runserver.bat error and its aggrivating the piss out of me… im working on a 517 turmoil soulsplit source, but when i go to run it to test my updates I cant run it the cmd says ive editted my run, changed to my edition, wont work still heres my run ---->
@echo off
Echo 517
color 9
cd …/build
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\java.exe” net/com/codeusa/Server 43594
pause

On my cmd when i run it, u get tons of errors like, main error class or some shit like that.
im running windows 7, which is a real pain in the ass.

client probs… the same thing when i try to run the client. heres my run client.bat ---->
@echo off
cd src
java -Xmx256m client 1 live live software members english game1
pause
its pissing me the fuck off please help me?!?!??!?!?!?!!?!?!?!?!?!?!??!?

Read full topic
item.source: Run server.bat and run client.bat errors
